Value.label: Power out action
Value.Help: Action in case of power out. This parameter is used to configure the device state after power on.

Item.label: Keep the last state when re-power on

Value.label: LED status
Value.Help: Configure LED (except boost) to be off irrespective of switch status.

Item.label: Disable all LED except for boost

Value.label: Auto off timer
Value.Help: Timer acts as auto off after specified minutes, setting is set in seconds. 0 - no auto off with timer. 1 ~ 86400 auto off after this specified time, unit second.

Value.label: Boost time
Value.Help: Configure boost time interval, unit minute. When user press the boost button one time, the boost time will increase 30 (the value can be changed) minutes.

Value.label: LED threshold setting
Value.Help: This parameter is used to configure the power led threshold, unit W. When the load <= 100W, the power led will indicate yellow. When the load > 100W, the power led will indicate orange. When no load, the power led will indicate white.

Value.label: kWh threshold setting
Value.Help: Threshold settings for energy kWh. When the energy above the threshold, it will send a meter report command to gateway. 0 - disable report. 1 ~ 10000 - enable report.

Value.label: Watt threshold setting
Value.Help: Threshold settings for Watt automatic report, unit W. When Watt above the threshold, it will send a meter report command to gateway. 0 - disable report. 1 ~ 2500 - enable report.

Value.label: Current threshold setting
Value.Help: Threshold settings for Current automatic report, unit 0.1A. When current above the threshold, it will send a meter report command to gateway. 0 - disable report. 1 ~ 150 - enable report.

Value.label: Watt report interval
Value.Help: Watt automatic report interval, unit second. 0 - disable. 65535 - enable.

Value.label: kWh report interval
Value.Help: kWh automatic report interval, unit second. 0 - disable. 65535 - enable.

Value.label: Voltage report interval
Value.Help: Voltage automatic report interval, unit second. 0 - disable. 65535 - enable.

Value.label: Current report interval
Value.Help: Current automatic report interval, unit second. 0 - disable. 65535 - enable.
